nodes.text: Emulsauce was a type of highly versatile savory condiment that could be used as a dip, a dressing, a sandwich topping, or a spread. It was smooth in texture and yellow in color. At some point after the Battle of Takodana in 34 ABY, the Artiodac chef Strono Tuggs included a recipe for the sauce in his cookbook, The Official Black Spire Outpost Cookbook, and also used it as an ingredient in the recipe for Deviled Pikobi Eggs included in the book. Tuggs claimed to eat emulsauce by the spoonful when no one was looking, and recommended it as a dip for fritzle fries or a sauce for his version of Ronto Wraps to make them taste more like Bakkar's original.

In the former expanded universe, emulsauce was served at Dex's Diner and was equivalent to mayonnaise. Emulsauce was introduced into the new canon in the 2019 recipe book Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge: The Official Black Spire Outpost Cookbook, written by Chelsea Monroe-Cassel and Marc Sumerak. The out-of-universe recipe for the sauce blends together egg yolks, kosher salt, cold water, rice vinegar, cold olive oil, and white miso paste.
